Day pass

Get more from your work day

Desde $10.000

Escape your home, your office or the street and make your day more productive with a Day Pass at any of our prime locations.

The Day Pass gives you access to our common spaces and Hot Desk working areas. Bring your computer, grab a desk and start working. You can purchase as many day passes as you like without the commitment of becoming a full-time member

Importante The Day Pass does not make you a member of Edge Cowork. If you want to become a member and enjoy all of the associated benefits and perks, you may be interested in a Hot Desk

Book a tour

Where can I find this plan El Golf Bellavista Nucleo Ochagavia

The Day Pass includes

Stable, high-speed internet with a 1:1 dedicated network of 100MB
Unlimited tea, purified water and quality roasted coffee
Comfortable, high-quality tables with built-in power outlets for computers and phones

Servicios adicionales

Car parking (subject to availability)
Meeting room hours
Event space
Color printers and scanners

To know more, send us a message
